name: recipe-book
description: The Simple Recipe Book is a one-day, open-book project tailored to immerse students in full-stack development. This platform will empower users to browse, add, edit, and rate recipes. It is crafted to merge all the concepts embraced in the bootcamp, notably HTML/CSS, JavaScript basics, DOM manipulation, server-side programming using Node.js, and database operations using PostgreSQL.
author: akhilesh-sahu
